name: Grave Robber (VilleMiettinen)
description:
You need to find three treasures buried in the graves.
But you must be careful because not all the graves hold a treasure inside them but bloodthirsty monsters.
Don't let these creatures catch you!
Also, be wary of the guard. He does not like you digging around either.

Good Luck!

Graphics Elina Heino, Sofia Suhonen and Tatu Uusitalo. Code Ville Miettinen and Mitja Pimenov.
